name: barquette
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a pastry case in the shape of a boat: Everyone at the table was served a small barquette of vegetables. We began the meal with curried prawn barquettes.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen you have made the mousse, pipe it into barquettes.Roll out small pieces of the dough and place them in barquette moulds.He had prepared a variety of tasty snacks, including spring rolls, and barquettes filled with pâté.I have a wonderful recipe for barquettes stuffed with salmon and beetroot mousse.
